name: Lightless (Lightanic Studios)
description:
A 3D puzzle game in which you must make use of light to manipulate enemies and the environment. We are happy to make available a build of the game to the public!

Requirements: 
OS: Windows 10
We recommend using an Xbox 360/Xbox One controller for optimal experience.

Keyboard Controls:

  • Movement (Keyboard Keys):
    • Up: W
    • Left: A
    • Down: S
    • Right: D
  • Lantern Toggle On/Off: Right Mouse Button
  • Use Item/Toggle Flashlight: Left Mouse Button
  • Burn Oil Trail: Press F
  • Accurate Rotation: Mouse Rotation
  • Pause Menu: Esc
